name: Scribble Stack
description:
OJam 2017: Best Game

OJam2017: Most Innovative Game

The Scribbler puts in earphones and scribbles the word they hear as the Decrypter guesses what they drew. 

Draw strategically as once a scribble is scribbled, it cannot be unscribbled! 

Made for OJam 2017, a 48-hour game jam.
Theme: "What's done cannot be undone"

Game by McGrills: Dongwen, Fiona and Ké

Logo and start screen by Meng Ting Ma.

Contribute: https://github.com/dingding132...
